"Motion Change":
"Motion Change allows you to change your character's animations for specific actions, such as running or jumping.

You can obtain additional animations to use from ticket items."

"You can register changed motions to your My Fashion by opening the Main Menu, selecting \"Equipment/Subpalette\", then selecting \"My Fashion\".

To view the motions you have registered, open the Main Menu, select \"Personal\", then \"Character Information\", then select \"Fashion Info\"."
